name: CrateMage
description:
Welcome to CrateMage!

Be prepared to overcome a series of box laden dungeon levels using your magical orbs to link together crates of varying types. Once linked, the two crates will move in unison provided each has room to do so. Beware, the deeper you go the more difficult & dangerous the challenges become.

Controls::

ControlActionWASD
Movement
SpacebarRecall all orbs
Left Mouse Button (Over Crate)
Link Crate
Right Mouse Button (Over Crate)
Unlink Crate
RRestart Level
MMute Music

Best of luck!

 ✌(◕‿-)✌
